letters.description: Identify burnout symptoms, triggers, and underlying stressors through self-assessment and mindful reflection.
Assess current coping mechanisms, lifestyle factors, and environmental influences contributing to burnout.
Develop personalized strategies for stress management, time management, and boundary setting to protect energy and well-being.
Cultivate self-compassion, resilience, and engagement in meaningful activities to foster a sense of purpose and fulfillment.
Implement sustainable lifestyle changes, monitor progress, and refine strategies to maintain long-term well-being and prevent future burnout.
